00009 bool isErrors(MavenCompiler* c) {
00010         // count errors
00011         int errorcount = 0;
00012         for(int i = 0; i < c->errors.length(); ++i)
00013                 if(c->errors[i].level == MAVEN_ERROR) ++errorcount;
00014         return errorcount > 0;
00015 }
